title: Recap: Tech drops opener to #1 Oklahoma - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Recap: Tech drops opener to #1 Oklahoma - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: LUBBOCK, Texas – Texas Tech (19-17, 2-5) fell to top-ranked Oklahoma (34-0, 4-0) by a score of 11-0 in five innings on Friday night at Rocky Johnson Field.
